description: Bite-size morsels don't get any better than these crispy fried agnolotti. Coated in panko breadcrumbs and served with a tomato pasta sauce, it's the perfect snack.
keywords: Pasta,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Summer,Soy free,Quick & easy lunch,Autumn,Apr 2021,Peanut free
name: Crispy Fried Agnolotti Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: tomato & basil pasta sauce, warmed (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place egg in a large bowl and breadcrumbs in a shallow dish. Working in batches, toss agnolotti in egg to coat, then dip in breadcrumbs and place on tray.

Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook agnolotti, in batches, for 2 minutes on each side or until golden and crisp. Drain on paper towel-lined plate, covering loosely to keep warm.
Scatter parmesan and basil over agnolotti, then serve with sauce.
